content: Suggest me which job suits for my skill set

Based on your skills in full-stack development, AI integration, and experience with languages like Python, C++, C#, and JavaScript, as well as your knowledge of databases, cloud technologies, and data science, you would be well-suited for roles such as Software Engineer, Full-Stack Developer, Data Scientist, or AI Engineer. These roles would allow you to leverage your technical expertise and continue to grow in the field of software engineering. Additionally, your experience with backend API development and chat application using Socket Programming could also make you a strong candidate for roles in application development and system integration.
